dt: {bc}products and companies that employ newly developed digital and online technologies in the banking and financial services industries

dt.t: The impact that {wi}fintech{/wi} is making throughout our economy is still in its infancy stages. {wi}Fintech{/wi} is really just about innovating and bringing solutions to the banking, lending and capital markets.
… a leading {wi}fintech{/wi} firm, a new breed of companies that offer loans through online platforms.

From payments to wealth management, from {d_link|peer-to-peer|peer-to-peer} lending to {d_link|crowdfunding|crowdfunding}, a new generation of startups is taking aim at the heart of the industry … . Like other disrupters from Silicon Valley, {ldquo}{wi}fintech{/wi}{rdquo} firms are growing fast.

dt: {bc}a business that uses or creates such technologies

dt.t: Traditional banks are eager to court {wi}fintechs{/wi} as clients, partners or vendors—often in all three roles at once.

shortdef: products and companies that employ newly developed digital and online technologies in the banking and financial services industries —often used before another noun; also : a business that uses or creates such technologies
